Method.name: CompilerMethod1
Method.Implementation: s id=##this.GetAttribute("id") s style=##this.GetAttribute("style") s name=##this.GetAttribute("name") s onclick=##this.GetAttribute("onclick") s alt=##this.GetAttribute("alt")

Method.name: RenderStartTag
Method.Implementation: New element Set element=##this Set %statuscode=$$$OK Do ..CompilerMethod1() Quit:$$$ISERR(%statuscode) %statuscode Do ..WriteCSPText("",1) Do ..WriteCSPText("",0) Quit $$$SKIPCHILDREN
